item.en: Accept from lan to the internet,and block from the internet
Advanced (Advanced firewall configuration applies, as specified by AdvancedLevel, OPTIONAL)
Only Accept HTTP/HTTPS/DNS/FTP from the LAN, block from the internet and prevent SYN Flood,ICMP Echo,ICMP Redirect,LAND attack,Smurf attack,Winuke attack
Accept from the LAN, block from the internet and only prevent ICMP Redirect
Accept from the LAN, block from the internet and close all dos attack
Accept from the LAN, block from the internet and allow customization
